Pre-Game Insights: Utah is looking to end its eight-game home slide with a win against Miami.
The Jazz have gone 2-13 in home games.
The Heat are 8-10 on the road.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Jazz's 14.1 made 3-pointers per game this season are just 0.5 more made shots on average than the 13.6 per game the Heat give up.
The Jazz average 111.3 points per game, 7.2 fewer points than the 118.5 the Jazz allow.
Collin Sexton is averaging 17.9 points and 3.9 assists for the Jazz.
Terry Rozier is shooting 40.0% and averaging 12.1 points for the Heat.
Others: The Jazz have been outscored by 6.9 points per game.
The Heat are 10-6 in games decided by at least 10 points.
